title: Will you ever go online
content:
You a have been a Beta site so long its silly

 [‹ IMs & red asterisks](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105805/http:/typophile.com/node/19297 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ehrhardt Volume Expert ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105805/http:/typophile.com/node/19428 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content: You have been Beta so long its silly
Probably waiting until Bill releases Vista, to make sure it will work with that. December was the last I heard.

Typophile works fine in IE7 - no need to wait.

Cheers, Si

I use it with with Firefox 1.5.02. I haven’t had any problems. I hope that the current version of Firefox is a testing resource; since it is common with both Windows and Mac OS users. IE7 and Safari 2.0.3 are fine too.

I’m more keen to see Linotypes Font Explorer X on PC!

(Yes, there have been [lots of threads](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105805/http:/typophile.com/node/18539) on this before.)

Current record for agonising waits is 24+ months: ( [phpwcms](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105805/http:/www.phpwcms.net/)).
